original_text: If it please the king, let it be decreed that they be destroyed, and I will pay 10,000 talents of silver into the hands of those who have charge of the king's business, that they may put it into the king's treasuries.”
korean_text: 왕이 옳게 여기시거든 조서를 내려 그들을 진멸하소서 내가 은 일만 달란트를 왕의 일을 맡은 자의 손에 맡겨 왕의 금고에 드리리이다 하니

sentences.original_text: let it be decreed that they be destroyed,
and I will pay 10,000 talents of silver
into the hands of those who have charge of the king's business,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 일을 맡은 자들의 손에 드리겠나이다,

sentences.original_text: that they may put it into the king's treasuries.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그것을 왕의 국고에 넣게 하려 함이니이다.
